data.title: Jo Van Fleet
data.text:
Born: 30-Dec-1914

Birthplace: Oakland, CA

Died: 10-Jun-1996

Location of death: Queens, NY

Cause of death: unspecified

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: East of Eden

Husband: William Bales (m. 1946, d. 1990, one son)

Son: Michael

University: University of the Pacific

Oscar for Best Supporting Actress 1956 for East of Eden

Tony 1954 for The Trip to Bountiful

Hollywood Walk of Fame 7000 Hollywood Blvd.

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Seize the Day (9-Sep-1986)

Le Locataire (26-May-1976)

Satan's School for Girls (19-Sep-1973)

The Gang That Couldn't Shoot Straight (22-Dec-1971) · Big Momma

80 Steps to Jonah (1969)

I Love You, Alice B. Toklas! (7-Oct-1968) · Mother

Cool Hand Luke (1-Nov-1967) · Arletta

Cinderella (22-Feb-1965)

Wild River (26-Mar-1960) · Ella Garth

This Angry Age (14-Feb-1958) · Mme. Dufresne

Gunfight at the O.K. Corral (30-May-1957)

The King and Four Queens (21-Dec-1956) · Ma McDade

I'll Cry Tomorrow (25-Dec-1955) · Katie Roth

The Rose Tattoo (12-Dec-1955) · Bessie

East of Eden (9-Mar-1955) · Kate
